title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 316.2 - Approval required for official marks
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 316.2 - Approval required for official marks

State Regulations

No device containing any official mark shall be made or
caused to be made for use on any product until it has been approved by the
commissioner as provided for in Part 317 of this Article. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
316.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
